snippet: The police said that a Brooklyn woman implicated herself in the killing of her toddler but that she did not give a reason.
abstract: Detectives arrest Anna Thomas in Brooklyn and charge her with murder and manslaughter in death of infant son Justin Stephens; police found boy unconscious in an Thomas's apartment after responding to emergency calls describing a woman trying to throw herself from a fifth-floor window; Thomas made statements indicating she had killed child and was planning to take her own life.
lead_paragraph: The police said that a Brooklyn woman implicated herself in the killing of her toddler but that she did not give a reason.

headline.main: Charges Filed Against Mother of Dead Boy in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Charges Filed Against Mother Of Dead Boy In Brooklyn
